METRIC_WS_DRINKINGWATER: Safe Drinking Water Act health-based violations
METRIC_WS_HAZARDOUSWASTE: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act hazardous waste violations
METRIC_ABK_HSINCOMPLETE: Population without high school education or equivalent
METRIC_ABK_LESSTHAN9TH: Population with less than 9th grade education
METRIC_EQ_DEFORESTATION: Percentage Forest Cover Decline from 2011 to 2016
METRIC_EQ_FLOODRISK: Percentage of Land Area in High Risk Flood Zone
METRIC_PR_BULLYINGHARASSMENT: Harassment or Bullying Incidents in Schools
DESC_NBM_DENTAL: Rate of visits to dentist or dental clinic for adults aged 18 and older in the previous year
DESC_NBM_FOODSECURITY: Estimated percentage of food insecure households, where food security is defined as having access, at all times, to enough food for an active, healthy life for all household members.
DESC_NBM_PREVENTATIVE: Rate of visits to doctor for routine checkup for adults aged 18 and older in the previous year
DESC_NBM_SUPERMARKETACCESS: Share of tract population that are beyond 1/2 mile from supermarket
DESC_PS_ACCIDENTS: Number of fatal motor vehicle accidents per 10,000 persons.
DESC_PS_PROPERTY: Property crime includes the offenses of burglary, larceny-theft, motor vehicle theft, and arson
DESC_PS_VIOLENT: Violent crime is composed of four offenses: murder and nonnegligent manslaughter, forcible rape, robbery, and aggravated assault.
DESC_S_EVICTIONS: Number of evictions per 100 renter homes in each census tract
DESC_S_HBURDENOWNER: Fraction of owned housing units with cost greater than 30% of household income
DESC_S_HBURDENRENTER: Fraction of rented housing units with cost greater than 30% of household income
DESC_S_HOMELESS: Unhoused/homeless persons per 100,000 persons as measured by local continuum-of-care (CoC) point-in-time (PIT) counts.
DESC_S_OVERCROWDED: Percentage of households with more than one occupant per room.
DESC_WS_DRINKINGWATER: Three year average of Safe Drinking Water Act health-based violations in public drinking water systems, modeled to census tract level from source location data.
DESC_WS_HAZARDOUSWASTE: Three year average of Resource Conservation and Recovery Act hazardous waste violations at monitored sites, modeled to census tract level from source location data.
DESC_WS_IMPERVIOUS: Percent of surface areas that are impervious to water.
DESC_ABK_G3READING: Percentage of 3rd graders reaching proficiency in language arts on state standardized tests where proficiency levels are modeled to be consistent across states and years.
DESC_ABK_G8MATH: Percentage of 8th graders reaching proficiency in mathematics on state standardized tests where proficiency levels are modeled to be consistent across states and years.
DESC_ABK_HSINCOMPLETE: Percent of population aged 18-24 without high school diploma or equivalent.
DESC_ABK_LESSTHAN9TH: Percentage of population with less than a 9th grade education.
DESC_ABK_PRESCHOOLENROLL: Percentage of three and four year olds enrolled in school
DESC_AIC_BROADBAND: Percentage of population with a broadband subscription.
DESC_AIC_BROADBANDSPEED: Average maximum download speed in megabytes per second advertised by all consumer ISPs.
DESC_AIC_CELLDATA: Percentage of population with a cellular data subscription.
DESC_AIC_NOINTERNET: Percentage of population with out any access to the internet.
DESC_EQ_DEFORESTATION: Percentage decline in total forested area in 2016 compared to base year 2011.
DESC_EQ_FLOODRISK: Percentage of total land area in FEMA-designated high-risk flood zones A, AE, V, or VE which all have at least a 1% annual chance of flooding and a 26% chance of flooding over the life of a 30-year mortgage.
DESC_EQ_NO2: Average annual nitrogen dioxide concentration in parts per billion, modeled to census tract level from air quality monitoring station data.
DESC_EQ_OZONE: Average 8-hour ozone concentration in parts per million, modeled to census tract level from air quality monitoring station data.
DESC_EQ_PM25: Average annual particulate matter (2.5) in micrograms per cubic meter, modeled to census tract level from air quality monitoring station data.
DESC_HW_CANCER: Cancer (excluding skin cancer) prevalence among adults aged 18 and older.
DESC_HW_CHD: Coronary heart disease prevalence among aduts aged 18 and older
DESC_HW_DIABETES: Percentage of adults aged 20 and above with diagnosed diabetes.
DESC_HW_DRUGOD: Deaths attributable to drug and alcohol overdoses per 100,000 persons.
DESC_HW_MENTALHEALTH: The average number of days a tract’s adult respondents report that their mental health was not good, based on the survey question: “Thinking about your mental health, which includes stress, depression, and problems with emotions, for how many days during the past 30 days was your mental health not good?”.
DESC_HW_MENTALHEALTHFACILITIES: Presence of mental health or substance abuse facilities per 100,000 persons.
DESC_HW_OBESITY: Percentage of adults that report a BMI of 30 or more.
DESC_AAE_ASSOCIATES: Percent of population 25 and older whose highest degree attained is an Associate's degree.
DESC_AAE_BACHELORS: Percent of population 25 and older whose highest degree attained is a Bachelor's degree.
DESC_AAE_GRADUATE: Percent of population 25 and older whose highest degree attained is a Master's, professional school degree, or Doctorate.
DESC_I_DISSIMILARITY: Index of dissimilarity between white and non-white tract residents. Conceptually, dissimilarity measures the percentage of a group’s population that would have to change residence for each block to have the same percentage of that group as the tract overall. The index ranges from 0.0 (complete integration) to 1.0 (complete segregation).
DESC_I_FEMALEREPRESENTATION: Percentage of women in state legislature or city council or equivalent in jurisdiction.
DESC_I_GENDERPAYGAP: Ratio of female to male median earnings in the past 12 months (2017 inflation-adjusted dollars)
DESC_I_ISOLATION: The isolation index measures the extent to which non-white tract residents are exposed only to one another, and is computed as the non-white-weighted average of the non-white proportion in each area.
DESC_I_LINGUISTIC: Households in which no one 14 and over speaks English only or speaks a language other than English at home and speaks English very well.
DESC_PFC_CLEANCOMMUTE: Percentage of commuters taking public transit, biking, walking, or working remotely.
DESC_PFC_DISCONNECTED: Percentage of teens and young adults ages 16-19 who are neither working nor in school.
DESC_PFC_ECE: Percentage of Local Educational Agencies (LEA), or school districts, that provide early childhood services to children birth through age 2.
DESC_PR_BULLYINGHARASSMENT: Number of reported bullying or harassment incidents on the basis of sex, race, or disability status in schools per 1,000 enrolled students.
DESC_PR_FATAL: Number of incidents involving fatal encounters with law enforcment per 100,000 persons.
DESC_PR_HOMEOWNERSHIP: Percentage of households that are owner-occupied.
DESC_PR_INCARCERATION: Rate of incarceration in state prisons and county jails per 100,000 persons.
DESC_PR_TURNOUT: Total number of voters divided by voting eligible population in the 2018 Midterm Elections.
